mapper.select: select s.store_no as store_no ,s.store_name as store_name ,l.user_email as user_email from likes l, stores s where l.store_no = s.store_no and l.user_email = #{user_email} order by s.store_name
select count(*) from likes where user_email = #{user_email} and store_no = #{store_no}
select count(store_no) from likes where user_email = #{user_email}
